name: "Don't Make Me Over" Quiz | 'Family Guy'- Season 4 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who does Meg try to ask out in the beginning of the episode?
questions.explanation:
Craig.

	Meg asks Craig out, but he says that he doesn't date men.  Meg feels bad about her image and she goes clothes shopping with Lois.

questions.text: Where was Peter once an intern?
questions.explanation:
The hospital.

	At the hospital, Peter once played a practical joke where he said to a man that his wife was a vegetable when she was really dead.

questions.text: When Meg gets a makeover from the news station, what colour does she have her hair dyed?
questions.explanation:
Blonde.

	Meg begins to feel better about herself because she looks much better than she did before.  Soon, everyone around her finds her more attractive.

questions.text: Where do the guys create their karaoke bar?
questions.explanation:
The Drunken Clam.

	After Horace decides to sell the bar, the guys get together to try and attract customers.  When Quagmire finds a karaoke machine in the back room, they bring it out and more people come.  They decide to create a band.

questions.text: Where does Peter's band have their first gig?
questions.explanation:
At a penitentiary.

	The gang names their band 'Fat, Black, Horny, and Joe'.  When they finally get on the stage, they realize that they don't know any songs.

questions.text: What does the Griffin family band travel in?
questions.explanation:
A bus.

	After the prison decides to attack Peter's band, the family decides to help him by performing their own song.  They end up performing a hit song and they get a record deal.

The White House.

	Peter once performed making baby noises for President Bush at the White House.  At this point in the show, the family is angry because Meg is taking control of the band.

questions.text: When the family band is scheduled to appear on "Saturday Night Live", who is the host?
questions.explanation:
Jimmy Fallon.

	In the opening scene of the show, Meg loses her virginity to Jimmy Fallon without knowing they're on live.  Peter decides to take revenge by beating up Jimmy Fallon.

questions.text: Does the family band get to perform their music on "Saturday Night Live"?
questions.explanation:
No.

	After Jimmy Fallon gets beat up, Meg decides to go back to her regular look because being beautiful took too much work.

questions.text: Who does not appear in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Loretta Brown.

	Adam West appears when the guys are trying to help The Drunken Clam succeed.  Other people appearing in this episode are Diane Simmons, Tricia Takanawa, and Dr. Diddy.
